answers.answer: You can share dopomoha.ro content effectively by downloading, printing, and displaying posters in crowded public places like storefronts or apartment buildings, or by sharing flyers with concise information and a QR code in various locations such as stores, transport, or parks.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Share the dopomoha.ro content where it is most needed'.

answers.answer: The common expressions guide includes expressions in Romanian, translated into English and Ukrainian.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Click here for the phrase book'.

answers.answer: The provided text does not explicitly state how the phrase book helps communication, only that it contains common expressions in Romanian, translated into English and Ukrainian.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Click here for the phrase book'.

answers.answer: Sprijin de Urgență can provide resources such as food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, or volunteers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: You can request resources from Sprijin de Urgență by using the 'Request or provide resources' option.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Un Acoperiș offers support in finding temporary accommodation or provides a space to help vulnerable people who are coming to Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: You can offer accommodation through Un Acoperiș by accessing the platform and using the 'Search or offer accommodation' option.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: You should access Un Acoperiș if you need support in finding temporary accommodation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.
